title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.1 - Institution of inquiry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.1 - Institution of inquiry

State Regulations

Inquiry pursuant to article 22 of the Labor Law by boards
of inquiry is not a matter of right. Such inquiry shall in general be
instituted only in cases whose magnitude or other qualities create a public
interest sufficient to justify its use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
285.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
